TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CodeTypeDeclaration extends System.CodeDom.CodeTypeMember

summary.span: 表示類別、結構、介面或列舉型別的型別宣告。

span.span: Represents a type declaration for a class, structure, interface, or enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用來代表程式碼會宣告類別、 結構、 介面或列舉型別。 can be used to represent code that declares a class, structure, interface, or enumeration. 可用來宣告巢狀在另一種類型的類型。 can be used to declare a type that is nested within another type. 屬性會指定基底型別或基底類型所宣告的型別。The property specifies the base type or base types of the type being declared. 屬性包含型別成員，其中可以包含方法、 欄位、 屬性、 註解和其他類型。The property contains the type members, which can include methods, fields, properties, comments and other types. 屬性會指出值型別宣告，這表示類型的類型類別目錄。The property indicates the values for the type declaration, which indicate the type category of the type. ， ， ，和方法指出型別是類別、 結構、 列舉型別或介面類型，分別。The , , , and methods indicate whether the type is a class, structure, enumeration, or interface type, respectively. > [!NOTE] > 某些程式設計語言只支援參考類型或類別的宣告。Some programming languages only support the declaration of reference types, or classes. 若要檢查的宣告介面、 列舉型別或實值型別支援特定語言的 CodeDOM 程式碼產生器，呼叫方法來測試適當旗標。To check a language-specific CodeDOM code generator for support for declaring interfaces, enumerations, or value types, call the method to test for the appropriate flags. 表示介面，支援表示列舉型別支援和表示實值型別，例如結構的支援。 indicates support for interfaces, indicates support for enumerations, and indicates support for value types such as structures. 您可以建立類別或結構中實作一個完整的宣告，或實作分散在多個宣告。You can build a class or a structure implementation in one complete declaration, or spread the implementation across multiple declarations. 屬性表示的型別宣告是完整或部分。The property indicates whether the type declaration is complete or partial. 並非所有的程式碼產生器支援部分型別宣告，因此您應該測試此支援，藉由呼叫旗標的方法。Not all code generators support partial type declarations, so you should test for this support by calling the method with the flag . ## Examples 此範例示範如何使用來宣告類型。This example demonstrates using a to declare a type. [!code-cpp[CodeTypeDeclarationExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeTypeDeclarationExample/CPP/codetypedeclarationexample.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CodeTypeDeclarationExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeTypeDeclarationExample/CS/codetypedeclarationexample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CodeTypeDeclarationExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeTypeDeclarationExample/VB/codetypedeclarationexample.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BaseTypes As CodeTypeReferenceCollection

span.span: Gets the base types of the type.

value.span: 物件，表示型別的基底型別。

span.span: A object that indicates the base types of the type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在 Visual Basic 中，不會繼承自基底型別，但未實作一個或多個介面會產生類別，您必須包含中的第一個項目為集合。To generate a class in Visual Basic that does not inherit from a base type, but that does implement one or more interfaces, you must include as the first item in the collection. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中您不需要針對如果您已實作的介面存在，而且您依型別，參考。In the .NET Framework version 2.0 you do not need the for if the interface you are implementing already exists and you are referring to it by type. 例如，如果您要實作介面，並將它新增至集合，此陳述式， `ctd.BaseTypes.Add(New CodeTypeReference(typeof(ICollection)))`，您不需要上述`ctd.BaseTypes.Add(New CodeTypeReference(GetType(Object)))`陳述式。For example, if you are implementing the interface and add it to the collection with this statement, `ctd.BaseTypes.Add(New CodeTypeReference(typeof(ICollection)))`, you do not need the preceding `ctd.BaseTypes.Add(New CodeTypeReference(GetType(Object)))` statement. 下列程式碼說明如何指的是集合。The following code illustrates the addition of a to the collection that refers to . ```vb Dim ctd As New CodeTypeDeclaration("Class1") ctd.IsClass = True ctd.BaseTypes.Add(New CodeTypeReference(GetType(Object))) ctd.BaseTypes.Add(New CodeTypeReference("Interface1")) ``` ```csharp CodeTypeDeclaration ctd = new CodeTypeDeclaration("Class1"); ctd.IsClass = true; ctd.BaseTypes.Add(new CodeTypeReference(typeof(Object))); ctd.BaseTypes.Add(new CodeTypeReference("Interface1")); ``` 上述程式碼會產生相當於下列 Visual Basic 程式碼。The preceding code generates the equivalent of the following Visual Basic code. ```vb Public Class Class1 Implements Interface1 ``` 不過，實際產生 Visual Basic 程式碼如下所示。However, the Visual Basic code actually generated is the following. ```vb Public Class Class1 Inherits Object Implements Interface1 ```

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出型別宣告是完整的，還是部分的。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the type declaration is complete or partial.

value.span: 如果類別或結構宣告是實作的部分表示，則為 ，如果宣告是類別或結構的完整實作，則為 。

span.span: if the class or structure declaration is a partial representation of the implementation; if the declaration is a complete implementation of the class or structure.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以建置一個完整的宣告中的類別或結構的實作，或實作分散在多個宣告。You can build a class or structure implementation in one complete declaration, or spread the implementation across multiple declarations. 實作通常會提供一個完整的型別宣告中。Implementations are commonly supplied in one complete type declaration. 在此案例中，設定型別宣告屬性設`false`，表示型別宣告表示的類別或結構實作的所有詳細資料。In this case, set the type declaration property to `false`, which indicates that the type declaration represents all details for the class or structure implementation. 部分型別宣告可讓您更輕鬆地建置的類別或結構實作不同的模組在您的應用程式的不同部分。A partial type declaration makes it easier to build different portions of a class or structure implementation in different modules of your application. 部分型別宣告可以是儲存在一個原始程式檔，或分散到多個原始程式檔，最後會形成的組合的型別實作一起編譯。The partial type declarations can be stored in one source file, or spread across multiple source files that are eventually compiled together to form the combined type implementation. C# 語言支援部分型別宣告的類別和結構透過`partial`關鍵字。The C# language supports partial type declarations of classes and structures through the `partial` keyword. Visual Basic 支援部分型別宣告的類別和結構與`Partial`關鍵字。Visual Basic supports partial type declarations of classes and structures with the `Partial` keyword. 並非所有的程式碼產生器支援部分型別宣告，因此您應該測試此支援，藉由呼叫旗標的方法。Not all code generators support partial type declarations, so you should test for this support by calling the method with the flag . > [!NOTE] > 支援部分型別宣告的類別和結構。Partial type declarations are supported for classes and structures. 如果您指定的列舉型別或介面的部分型別宣告時，產生的程式碼會產生編譯器錯誤。If you specify a partial type declaration for an enumeration or interface, the generated code produces compiler errors. 當提供的類別或結構實作跨多個宣告，設定屬性設`true`初始宣告和所有補充的宣告。When supplying a class or structure implementation across multiple declarations, set the property to `true` for the initial declaration and all supplemental declarations. 初始宣告必須完整指定的型別簽章，包括存取修飾詞、 繼承型別，以及實作介面。The initial declaration must fully specify the type signature, including access modifiers, inherited types, and implemented interfaces. 增補的宣告不需要重新指定型別簽章。The supplementary declarations do not need to re-specify the type signature. 編譯器錯誤通常是如果您重新定義型別中的簽章的增補的宣告。A compiler error typically results if you redefine the type signature in a supplementary declaration. Visual Studio 2005 會使用部分型別，來分隔使用者產生的程式碼，從設計工具的程式碼。Visual Studio 2005 uses partial types to separate user-generated code from designer code. 在 Visual Basic Windows 應用程式專案中，使用者程式碼放在部分類別中的未限定`Partial`關鍵字，設計工具提供程式碼會出現在部分類別中具有`Partial`關鍵字。In Visual Basic Windows Application projects, the user code is placed in a partial class that is not qualified by the `Partial` keyword; the designer-provided code appears in the partial class that has the `Partial` keyword. 在 C# 中，所以使用者程式碼和設計工具程式碼會顯示所識別的部分類別中`partial`關鍵字。In C#, both the user code and designer code appear in partial classes identified by the `partial` keyword. ## Examples 此範例示範如何使用提供跨多個宣告的類別實作。This example demonstrates using a to supply a class implementation across multiple declarations. 此範例會建立初始的類別宣告陳述式，並設定屬性設`true`。The example builds the initial class declaration statement and sets the property to `true`. [!code-cpp[CodeDomPartialTypeExample#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDomPartialTypeExample/CPP/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[CodeDomPartialTypeExample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDomPartialTypeExample/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CodeDomPartialTypeExample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDomPartialTypeExample/VB/source.vb#3)] 在範例中不同的方法擴充的類別實作。A different method in the example extends the class implementation. 這個方法會建置新的型別宣告陳述式，現有的類別和組屬性設`true`。This method builds a new type declaration statement for the existing class and sets the property to `true`. 編譯器會結合兩個部分的型別宣告，以進行完整的類別實作。The compiler combines the two partial type declarations together for the complete class implementation. [!code-cpp[CodeDomPartialTypeExample#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDomPartialTypeExample/CPP/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[CodeDomPartialTypeExample#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDomPartialTypeExample/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[CodeDomPartialTypeExample#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeDomPartialTypeExample/VB/source.vb#7)]

member this.TypeAttributes : System.Reflection.TypeAttributes with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定型別的屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets the attributes of the type.
A object that indicates the attributes of the type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含所使用之值的相同類型調查執行階段的型別時。The property contains the same type of values used by when investigating a type at run time. 許多這些旗標未對應到某些語言中的型別宣告語法。Many of these flags do not correspond to the type declaration syntax for some languages. 如此一來，只有下列旗標會明顯: ， ， ， ， ， ， ，和。As a result, only the following flags are significant to : , , , , , , , and . > [!NOTE] > 這類的旗標的一些中的旗標的意義與重疊屬性繼承自。Some of the flags such as overlap with the meaning of flags in the property of that is inherited from . 屬性是一個副作用類別繼承自以便可以巢狀類別。The property is a side effect of the class inheriting from so that classes can be nested. 中的旗標屬性應該用來取代中的旗標屬性。The flags in the property should be used instead of the flags in the property. > [!NOTE] > 設定可見性旗標的模式 (包含之字詞的旗標`Public`或是`Nested`) 是遮住所有可見性旗標使用，然後設定所需的可見性旗標。The pattern for setting the visibility flags (flags containing the words `Public` or `Nested`) is to mask out all visibility flags using the and then set the desired visibility flag. 例如，C# 程式碼陳述式來識別(名為`cd`) 的內部類別現狀`cd.TypeAttributes = (cd.TypeAttributes & ~TypeAttributes.VisibilityMask) | TypeAttributes.NotPublic;`。For example, the C# code statement to identify the (named `cd`) as an internal class is `cd.TypeAttributes = (cd.TypeAttributes & ~TypeAttributes.VisibilityMask) | TypeAttributes.NotPublic;`. 在 Visual Basic 中設定的相同值的程式碼是`cd.TypeAttributes = (cd.TypeAttributes And (TypeAttributes.VisibilityMask Xor -1)) Or TypeAttributes.NotPublic`。The code to set the same value in Visual Basic is `cd.TypeAttributes = (cd.TypeAttributes And (TypeAttributes.VisibilityMask Xor -1)) Or TypeAttributes.NotPublic`. 設定屬性，直接以可見性旗標 (`cd.TypeAttributes = TypeAttributes.NotPublic;`) 會清除所有其他可能設定的旗標。Setting the property directly to a visibility flag (`cd.TypeAttributes = TypeAttributes.NotPublic;`) erases all other flags that might be set.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TypeParameters As CodeTypeParameterCollection

summary.span: 取得型別宣告的型別參數。

span.span: Gets the type parameters for the type declaration.
A that contains the type parameters for the type declaration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 泛型型別宣告包含一個或多個未指定稱為型別參數的類型。A generic type declaration contains one or more unspecified types known as type parameters. 型別參數名稱代表泛型宣告主體內的型別。A type parameter name stands for the type within the body of the generic declaration. 例如，泛型宣告類別包含的型別參數`T`。For example, the generic declaration for the class contains the type parameter `T`. 如需有關泛型的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 類別庫中的泛型](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/generics/generics-in-the-net-framework-class-library.md)。For more information on generics, see [Generics in the .NET Framework Class Library](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/generics/generics-in-the-net-framework-class-library.md).
